opinion.posture: Indictment charging defendant with burglary, larceny, unlawful possession of burglary tools, and conspiracy. Before SHELLEY, J., specially presiding. Appeal, No. 1051, Oct. T., 1971, from judgment of sentence of Court of Common Pleas of Chester County, Sept. T., 1968, No. 386, 386A, 386B, 386C, 386E, and 386F. Submitted June 12, 1972.
opinion.attorneys: V. Clayton McQuiddy,III, Assistant Public Defender, and William J. Gallagher, Public Defender, for appellant; Norman J. Pine, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
